io.requery

Interface Queryable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the base class or interface to restrict all entities that are queried to.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockingEntityStore<T>, CompletionStageEntityStore<T>, EntityStore<T,R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompletableEntityStore, EntityDataStore, SingleEntityStore

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public interface Queryable<T>
    Interface for querying both Entity objects and selectable attributes of those objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <E extends T>
      Selection<Scalar<Integer>>      		 count(Class<E> type)
      Initiates a query to count the number of entities of a given type.
      Selection<Scalar<Integer>> count(QueryAttribute<?,?>... attributes)
      Initiates a query to count a given selection.
      Deletion<Scalar<Integer>> delete()
      Initiates a delete query against this data store.
      <E extends T>
      Deletion<Scalar<Integer>>      		 delete(Class<E> type)
      Initiates an delete query for a type.
      <E extends T>
      Insertion<Result<Tuple>>      		 insert(Class<E> type)
      Initiates an insert operation for a type.
      <E extends T>
      Result<E>      		 raw(Class<E> type, String query, Object... parameters)
      Executes a raw query against the data store mapping on to a specific entity type.
      Result<Tuple> raw(String query, Object... parameters)
      Executes a raw query against the data store.
      <E extends T>
      Selection<Result<E>>      		 select(Class<E> type, QueryAttribute<?,?>... attributes)
      Initiates a query against a set of expression values return a specific entity type in a Result.
      <E extends T>
      Selection<Result<E>>      		 select(Class<E> type, Set<? extends QueryAttribute<E,?>> attributes)
      Initiates a query against a set of expression values return a specific entity type in a Result.
      Selection<Result<Tuple>> select(Expression<?>... expressions)
      Initiates a query against a set of expression values.
      Selection<Result<Tuple>> select(Set<? extends Expression<?>> expressions)
      Initiates a query against a set of expression values.
      Update<Scalar<Integer>> update()
      Initiates an update query against this data store.
      <E extends T>
      Update<Scalar<Integer>>      		 update(Class<E> type)
      Initiates an update query for a type.

    • Method Detail

      • select

        @CheckReturnValue
<E extends T> Selection<Result<E>> select(Class<E> type,
                                                            QueryAttribute<?,?>... attributes)
        Initiates a query against a set of expression values return a specific entity type in a Result.
        Type Parameters:
        E - entity type
        Parameters:
        type - of entity
        attributes - to select (must of be of type E, not enforced due to erasure)
        Returns:
        next query step

      • select

        @CheckReturnValue
<E extends T> Selection<Result<E>> select(Class<E> type,
                                                            Set<? extends QueryAttribute<E,?>> attributes)
        Initiates a query against a set of expression values return a specific entity type in a Result.
        Type Parameters:
        E - entity type
        Parameters:
        type - of entity
        attributes - to select (must of be of type E, not enforced due to erasure)
        Returns:
        next query step

      • insert

        @CheckReturnValue
<E extends T> Insertion<Result<Tuple>> insert(Class<E> type)
        Initiates an insert operation for a type. After completing the expression call Return.get() to perform the operation. If the type has no generated key values the result is a tuple containing a single element with the number of rows affected by the operation. Otherwise if the type has generated keys those keys are returned as the result.
        Type Parameters:
        E - entity type
        Parameters:
        type - of entity
        Returns:
        next query step

      • update

        @CheckReturnValue
<E extends T> Update<Scalar<Integer>> update(Class<E> type)
        Initiates an update query for a type. After completing the expression call Return.get() to perform the operation. The result is the number of rows affected by the call. Note that aggregate update queries will not affect existing entity objects in memory.
        Type Parameters:
        E - entity type
        Parameters:
        type - of entity
        Returns:
        next query step

      • delete

        @CheckReturnValue
<E extends T> Deletion<Scalar<Integer>> delete(Class<E> type)
        Initiates an delete query for a type. After completing the expression call Return.get() to perform the operation. Note that aggregate delete queries will not affect existing entity objects in memory or in the EntityCache associated with the store.
        Type Parameters:
        E - entity type
        Parameters:
        type - of entity
        Returns:
        next query step

      • count

        @CheckReturnValue
<E extends T> Selection<Scalar<Integer>> count(Class<E> type)
        Initiates a query to count the number of entities of a given type.
        Type Parameters:
        E - entity type
        Parameters:
        type - of entity
        Returns:
        next query step

Selection<Scalar<Integer>> count(QueryAttribute<?,?>... attributes)

      • select

        @CheckReturnValue
Selection<Result<Tuple>> select(Set<? extends Expression<?>> expressions)
        Initiates a query against a set of expression values.
        Parameters:
        expressions - to select, cannot be null or empty
        Returns:
        next query step

      • update

        @CheckReturnValue
Update<Scalar<Integer>> update()
        Initiates an update query against this data store. After completing the expression call Return.get() to perform the operation. The result is the number of rows affected by the call. Note that aggregate update queries will not affect existing entity objects in memory.
        Returns:
        next query step

      • delete

        @CheckReturnValue
Deletion<Scalar<Integer>> delete()
        Initiates a delete query against this data store. After completing the expression call Return.get() to perform the operation. The result is the number of rows affected by the call. Note that aggregate update queries will not affect existing entity objects in memory.
        Returns:
        next query step

      • raw

        @CheckReturnValue
Result<Tuple> raw(String query,
                                    Object... parameters)
        Executes a raw query against the data store.
        Parameters:
        query - raw query to execute
        parameters - query arguments, the number of arguments must match the number of place holder values in the query or a PersistenceException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        the result of the query as a Tuple.

      • raw

        @CheckReturnValue
<E extends T> Result<E> raw(Class<E> type,
                                              String query,
                                              Object... parameters)
        Executes a raw query against the data store mapping on to a specific entity type.
        Type Parameters:
        E - entity type
        Parameters:
        type - entity type
        query - raw query to execute
        parameters - query arguments, the number of arguments must match the number of place holder values in the query or a PersistenceException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        the result of the query.
